title: Shaved Ice Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>This is refreshing~! Shaved ice on a hot day is the best~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ugh......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Huh? What’s wrong?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I’m getting brain freeze......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ah, I see. It happens. You should rub your temples with your palms. Let me do it for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>......Thank you. I feel better now. Are you okay, Chika-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yup! I’ve completed my investigation!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Investigation?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>If you eat shaved ice too quickly, you’ll get brain freeze. I found the optimal speed to eat it in order to not get brain freeze!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>What an interesting investigation...... I’ll try that too, then!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
